name: Brutal Homicide 2: The Future Forces
overview: Development started 17 February 1997. The aim was to create a 1 or 2 player game in the style of Chaos Engine. During the development, the game became more and more like the old Brutal Homicide (a 2-player versus game). Sadly, the game never got really stable and development stopped. This beta version was the only release made.
